 2008-15832008-09-04,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the designation by the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology of FERNAND PROULX of Gatineau, Quebec, to act as Director of the National Museum of Science and Technology, until such time as a new Director is appointed.
